Description: Sherd of North Ionian Late Wild Goat style pottery plate; three offsets on underside; cream slip; underside reserved save for outermost step; interior: band at preserved edge; to the centre, black-figured animal frieze showing boar to left with rosettes as fill; band with added red band lined in white; further frieze with part of animal and a rosette.
Curator's comments: Probably from same plate as 1965,0930.708; both may belong with 1888,0601.395a--c.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.679)
